name: SoulMap
description:
This small game is part of the course "Build The Toy First". 

Made by: Mylène Ben Osman, Anna Margrét Jónudóttir,  Benjamin Rose, Suzanne Bogaard.

"It is often said in game development, that you should build the toy first, before further develop it into a game. This is not just essential to have a better game/ toy, but also a better and organic development process. The designer should take a playful position towards her own game, so she can explore its emergent/ inherent possibilities through wild experimentation. Unfortunately that’s easier said than done. ..." - Prof. Csongor Baranyai

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Build a Toy First"  (WinterSemester 2021/2022)
